segments.text: I notice the warm light from the window illuminating the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, apron on, drying dishes peacefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems oblivious to the water cascading over the sink edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking how unaware she is of the flood building up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get ruined from the splashing water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my gaze left, I see the open cabinet with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is stretching to snag some cookies from it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool he's on looks ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him is anticipating her cookie with wide eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sweet how they're sharing this moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the risks are everywhere, from the wet floor to the tipping stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden view outside makes the inside seem even more chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens to interrupt their innocent fun.
segments.speaker: PAR
